attr.title: Death Road to Canada
attr.desc: Control a car full of jerks as they explore cities, recruit weird people, rescue dogs, argue with each other, and face gigantic swarms of slow zombies. Randomly generated for a new story and rare events every time you play!
attr.inst: Take the Windows/Linux game files from your game folder, then dump them straight into /ports/deathroad/. From there, just go launch the game via your console
attr.inst_md: Take the Windows/Linux game files from your game folder, then dump them straight into /ports/deathroad/.
